findings.title: Wrong burning
findings.description: The function _takeburnFee() decreases _tTotal value but doesnâ€™t decrease _rTotal value, so it is changing reflection rate, not burning.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward(), _getCurrentSupply(), and whitelistMultipleAddress() use loops that could lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if there are long excluded addresses or whitelisted address lists.
